author: Universal Pictures
description: Among many efforts on Jurassic World Rebirth to preserve the environments where they filmed, Producer Patrick Crowley, stars Scarlett Johansson, Luna Blaise and Audrina Miranda, and Andrew Schembri of the organization Zibel speak about these amazing locations and share how the production partnered on a ghost net retrieval that salvaged abandoned fishing gear from 18 different reefs, as well as multiple beach cleanups with cast and crew that collected more than 2.5 tons of debris that had washed onto shore. See these beautiful beaches on the big screen, in theaters now! #GreenerLight
title: Beach Cleanups & Ghost Net Dives | Jurassic World Rebirth

author: Universal Pictures
description: Nature is big and powerful, and we must do our part to protect it. Hear from director Gareth Edwards, producers Frank Marshall and Patrick Crowley, and cast members Scarlett Johansson and Luna Blaise about how they reduced their environmental footprint, reused and donated materials, and led beach and ocean cleanups to preserve the incredible natural landscapes where they filmed. Don’t get left behind – catch #JurassicWorldRebirth, in theaters now! #GreenerLight
title: Behind-the-Scenes Sustainability | Jurassic World Rebirth

author: Universal Pictures
description:
Conan (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is trapped in a hall of mirrors, facing a shapeshifting monster that uses reflections to attack.

title: Arnold Goes Full Barbarian💥💪 #ConantheDestroyer #Shorts

author: Universal Pictures
title: We're going to need a bigger boat. Return to Amity Island and experience Jaws in theaters August 29.

author: Universal Pictures
description:
At Universal, theme parks transport fans into iconic stories and immersive worlds they once only imagined, and in doing so ignite the thrill of being fully alive. In this episode of Seen on the Screen, Jacqueline Coley sits down with Brian Robinson, Executive Vice President and Chief Creative Officer at Universal Creative, to talk about the making of Universal Epic Universe.

Recorded on-site at the Universal Helios Grand Hotel, a Loews Property, Brian shares his journey from a movie-loving kid in Shreveport, Louisiana to leading the team that envisions, designs, and innovates the iconic attractions, lands and worlds that define Universal Theme Parks globally. He opens up about the emotional power of vulnerability, storytelling, the influence of The Birdcage and Steel Magnolias and explains how his creative process begins with words on a page and ends with a fully immersive experience where you can fly with dragons or lose yourself in a monster's lair. Every detail—from the sound desi
title: Building Universal Epic Universe with Brian Robinson | Seen on the Screen with Jacqueline Coley
